metadata.title: CVE-2016-9180 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
perl-XML-Twig: The option to `expand_external_ents`, documented ascontrolling external entity expansion in XML::Twig does not work. Externalentities are always expanded, regardless of the option's setting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9180` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-twig-perl - 1:3.50-2
xml-twig-tools - 1:3.50-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml-twig-perl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.50-2').
